MANAGER OF FINANCE

SUMMARY

Experienced Certified Public Accountant (CPA) with extensive financial and audit experience.
I have a proven track record to improve monthly financial close processes; analyze financial results for areas of opportunity; and audit financial activities to identify potential financial misstatements and internal control weaknesses.
Strengths include:
*Financial analysis & reporting *Financial management
*Budget preparation & management *Revenue management
*Highly organized & detail-oriented *Strong interpersonal skills

<JD_START>
Job Title: Taxonomist

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance, General Business

Description:
We are seeking an experienced Taxonomist to join our team and take ownership of maintaining, enhancing, and expanding our taxonomy for the crypto ecosystem. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring that our taxonomy remains relevant, comprehensive, and accurately reflects the latest developments, trends, and emerging verticals within the rapidly evolving crypto space.
ResponsibilitiesManage and maintain existing taxonomy for classifying and categorizing various crypto projects, protocols, technologies, and concepts.Continuously monitor and research the crypto ecosystem to identify new trends, verticals, or emerging technologies that should be incorporated into our taxonomy.Collaborate with our analysts, researchers, and data engineers to ensure that our taxonomy accurately captures the nuances and complexities of the crypto space.Develop and document clear guidelines, rules, and best practices for applying and maintaining the taxonomy consistently across our data sources and analysis.Work closely with our labeling, analyst and engineering teams to ensure accurate application of the taxonomy and provide guidance on edge cases or ambiguities.Identify and address inconsistencies, redundancies, or gaps within the existing taxonomy, and propose solutions for improvement.Conduct regular audits and quality checks to maintain the integrity and accuracy of the taxonomy.Provide training, support and education material to labeling teams. Requirements3+ years of experience in taxonomy development, management, or a related role, preferably within a complex or rapidly evolving domain.In-depth knowledge and understanding of taxonomy design principles, information architecture, and knowledge organization systems.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to navigate ambiguity and make sound judgments.Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining data quality and consistency.Passion for staying up-to-date with emerging trends and developments in the crypto space.We are even more interested in chatting if you…Experience with cryptocurrency and blockchain technologies (DeFi, NFT, L1s, L2s)Familiarity with data labeling, data entry, and knowledge management processes.Experience working with SQL/Python.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
